comments: Tests covering query state checkpointing smoke test cases

tests.name: versioned_kv_state_checkpoint
tests.description: tail query from versioned_kv state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_vk_stream
create stream if not exists test19_vk_stream(i int, s string) primary key s settings mode='versioned_kv'
insert into test19_vk_stream(i, s) values (1, 'a'), (2, 'b'), (3, 'a')
subscribe to select i, s from test19_vk_stream settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_vk_stream(i, s) values (4, 'c')
insert into test19_vk_stream(i, s) values (5, 'd'), (6, 'c')
recover from '19250'
kill query where query_id='19250' sync
unsubscribe to '19250'

tests.name: versioned_kv_state_checkpoint
tests.description: global aggr query from versioned_kv state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_vk_stream
create stream if not exists test19_vk_stream(i int, s string, val float) primary key s settings mode='versioned_kv'
insert into test19_vk_stream(i, s) values (1, 'a', 10), (2, 'b', 20)
subscribe to select count(*), min(val), max(val), sum(val), avg(val) from test19_vk_stream emit periodic 1s settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_vk_stream(i, s) values (3, 'a', 30)
insert into test19_vk_stream(i, s) values (4, 'c', 50), (5, 'b', 10)
recover from '19251'
kill query where query_id='19251' sync
unsubscribe to '19251'

tests.name: all_primary_keys_join
tests.description: append-only join versioned_kv with all primary keys state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_append_left_stream
drop stream if exists test19_vk_right_stream
create stream if not exists test19_append_left_stream (i1 int, i2 int, s string)
create stream if not exists test19_vk_right_stream (ii1 int, ii2 int, ss string) primary key (ii1, ii2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
subscribe to select i1, i2, s, ii1, ii2, ss from test19_append_left_stream inner join test19_vk_right_stream on i1 = ii1 and i2 = ii2 settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 'ss1')
insert into test19_append_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's1')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 'ss2')
recover from '19252'
insert into test19_append_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's2')
kill query where query_id='19252' sync
unsubscribe to '19252'

tests.name: all_primary_keys_join
tests.description: versioned_kv join versioned_kv with all primary keys state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_vk_left_stream
drop stream if exists test19_vk_right_stream
create stream if not exists test19_vk_left_stream (i1 int, i2 int, s string) primary key (i1, i2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
create stream if not exists test19_vk_right_stream (ii1 int, ii2 int, ss string) primary key (ii1, ii2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
subscribe to select i1, i2, s, ii1, ii2, ss, _tp_delta from test19_vk_left_stream inner join test19_vk_right_stream on i1 = ii1 and i2 = ii2 settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 'ss1')
insert into test19_vk_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's1')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 'ss2')
insert into test19_vk_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's2')
recover from '19253'
kill query where query_id='19253' sync
unsubscribe to '19253'

tests.name: partial_primary_key_join
tests.description: append-only join versioned_kv with all primary keys state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_append_left_stream
drop stream if exists test19_vk_right_stream
create stream if not exists test19_append_left_stream (i1 int, i2 int, s string)
create stream if not exists test19_vk_right_stream (ii1 int, ii2 int, ss string) primary key (ii1, ii2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
subscribe to select i1, i2, s, ii1, ii2, ss from test19_append_left_stream inner join test19_vk_right_stream on i1 = ii1 settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 'ss1')
insert into test19_append_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's1')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 'ss2')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 2, 'ss3')
recover from '19254'
insert into test19_append_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's2')
kill query where query_id='19254' sync
unsubscribe to '19254'

tests.name: partial_primary_key_join
tests.description: versioned_kv join versioned_kv with all primary keys state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_vk_left_stream
drop stream if exists test19_vk_right_stream
create stream if not exists test19_vk_left_stream (i1 int, i2 int, s string) primary key (i1, i2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
create stream if not exists test19_vk_right_stream (ii1 int, ii2 int, ss string) primary key (ii1, ii2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
subscribe to select i1, i2, s, ii1, ii2, ss, _tp_delta from test19_vk_left_stream inner join test19_vk_right_stream on i1 = ii1 settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 'ss1')
insert into test19_vk_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's1')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 'ss2')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 2, 'ss3')
recover from '19255'
insert into test19_vk_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's2')
kill query where query_id='19255' sync
unsubscribe to '19255'

tests.name: No_primary_key_join
tests.description: append-only join versioned_kv with No primary key(s) join state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_append_left_stream
drop stream if exists test19_vk_right_stream
create stream if not exists test19_append_left_stream (i1 int, i2 int, s string)
create stream if not exists test19_vk_right_stream (ii1 int, ii2 int, ss string) primary key (ii1, ii2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
subscribe to select i1, i2, s, ii1, ii2, ss from test19_append_left_stream inner join test19_vk_right_stream on s = ss settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 's1')
insert into test19_append_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's1')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 's2')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (2, 2, 's1')
recover from '19256'
insert into test19_append_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's1')
kill query where query_id='19256' sync
unsubscribe to '19256'

tests.name: No_primary_key_join
tests.description: versioned_kv join versioned_kv with No primary key(s) join state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_vk_left_stream
drop stream if exists test19_vk_right_stream
create stream if not exists test19_vk_left_stream (i1 int, i2 int, s string) primary key (i1, i2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
create stream if not exists test19_vk_right_stream (ii1 int, ii2 int, ss string) primary key (ii1, ii2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
subscribe to select i1, i2, s, ii1, ii2, ss, _tp_delta from test19_vk_left_stream inner join test19_vk_right_stream on s = ss settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 's1')
insert into test19_vk_left_stream(i1, i2, s) values (1, 1, 's1')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (1, 1, 's2')
insert into test19_vk_right_stream(ii1, ii2, ss) values (2, 2, 's1')
recover from '19257'
unsubscribe to '19257'
